author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Citrix Systems Reports Q1 GAAP EPS Of $0.99
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - Citrix Systems Inc:
* CITRIX REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.29
* Q1 REVENUE $697 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $675 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.05 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $5.20 TO $5.30 EXCLUDING ITEMS
* SEES Q2 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.18 TO $1.22 EXCLUDING ITEMS
* SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $710 MILLION TO $720 MILLION * NET INCOME FOR Q1 2018 INCLUDES RESTRUCTURING CHARGES OF $6 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
